description: <p>GP PARTNER / SALARIED GP - CHURCHWOOD SURGERY, PONTYPOOL, TORFAEN<br /><br />VACANCY DESCRIPTION:<br /><br />Partner/Salaried GP(s) 2 - 6 sessions (Tuesday or Wednesday and Friday ideally)<br /><br />We are a well organized, medium sized practice based in Pontypool, with a dispensing branch surgery in Goytre.
